response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by you. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure this fantastic deal. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.
